days.title: Sapporo Snow Festival
days.description: Check out the massive snow sculptures at Odori Park. Dinner: Soup Curry.

days.title: Otaru Canal
days.description: Train to Otaru. Walking along the canal, visiting the Music Box Museum and eating LeTAO cheesecake.

days.title: Niseko Skiing
days.description: Bus to Niseko Grand Hirafu. Full day on the slopes enjoying the legendary Japow.
